Yeah, really need to more know about your goals, how often you can workout and all that good stuff.
3-sets of 5 to 8-reps should be a good starting point for most goals, but really more information is needed.

If you have a bulge there now, it is probably a hernia. If not, could just be a strain, but either way, you should probably have a doctor look at it.
Did the pain go away?

If you haven't read, The Omnivore's Dilemma, I would suggest giving it a read.
So much of this X vs Y is just stupid and a waste of time. Don't follow a diet just because it is popular and you want to fit in.
I have friends that do great on a paleo diet and ones that do good following a vegan diet. Just depends on what works well for your body and your value system.

I would put money on that gas shock starting to fail within a year, depending on how hard you work it.
I would keep saving for the Concept 2.
